languages.text: "Недавно туда полез какой-то чокнутый людишко. Как его там звали, Версореан? Старый, но крепкий... и слишком громкий. Он там наверняка всех тварей переполошил своим визитом. Лучше бы тебе быть поосторожнее и потише".

"Some unhinged humanling went there recently. What did they call him? Wersorean? He was old, but strong... and too loud. His visit probably stirred up all the freaks. You should be more careful and quieter than he was."
languages.original_text: "Недавно туда полез какой-то чокнутый людишко. Как его там звали, Версореан? Старый, но крепкий... и слишком громкий. Он там наверняка всех тварей переполошил своим визитом. Лучше бы тебе быть поосторожнее и потише".

traits.locale_text: "Some unhinged humanling went there recently. What did they call him? Wersorean? He was old, but strong... and too loud. His visit probably stirred up all the freaks. You should be more careful and quieter than he was."
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: "Some unhinged humanling went there recently. What did they call him? Wersorean? He was old, but strong... and too loud. His visit probably stirred up all the freaks. You should be more careful and quieter than he was."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: “最近，有个精神错乱的家伙跑到那边去了。那群人叫他什么来着？歪尔森？他是个老家伙，但很强壮……而且很吵。他过去之后，那边的怪人估计全都被他搅合起来了。你得比他更小心、更安静才行。”
languages.original_text: "Some unhinged humanling went there recently. What did they call him? Wersorean? He was old, but strong... and too loud. His visit probably stirred up all the freaks. You should be more careful and quieter than he was."

traits.locale_text: “最近，有个精神错乱的家伙跑到那边去了。那群人叫他什么来着？歪尔森？他是个老家伙，但很强壮……而且很吵。他过去之后，那边的怪人估计全都被他搅合起来了。你得比他更小心、更安静才行。”
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: «Hace poco fue allí un humano desquiciado. ¿Cómo se llamaba? ¿Wersorean? Era viejo pero fuerte... y ruidoso. Con su visita, habrá despertado a todos esos mamarrachos. Deberías ser más cuidados{mf|o|a} y silencios{mf|o|a} que él».
languages.original_text: "Some unhinged humanling went there recently. What did they call him? Wersorean? He was old, but strong... and too loud. His visit probably stirred up all the freaks. You should be more careful and quieter than he was."

traits.locale_text: «Hace poco fue allí un humano desquiciado. ¿Cómo se llamaba? ¿Wersorean? Era viejo pero fuerte... y ruidoso. Con su visita, habrá despertado a todos esos mamarrachos. Deberías ser más cuidados{mf|o|a} y silencios{mf|o|a} que él».
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: 「最近、あそこへ気が狂った人間が行ったという噂だ。なんという名前だったか…確か“ウェルソリアン”と言っていたかな？ずいぶん年を取っていたが、非常に力強く…うるさい奴だった。奴が行ったことで大勢の狂人が度肝を抜かれただろう。貴様が行く時はもう少し静かにしたほうがいい」
languages.original_text: "Some unhinged humanling went there recently. What did they call him? Wersorean? He was old, but strong... and too loud. His visit probably stirred up all the freaks. You should be more careful and quieter than he was."

traits.locale_text: 「最近、あそこへ気が狂った人間が行ったという噂だ。なんという名前だったか…確か“ウェルソリアン”と言っていたかな？ずいぶん年を取っていたが、非常に力強く…うるさい奴だった。奴が行ったことで大勢の狂人が度肝を抜かれただろう。貴様が行く時はもう少し静かにしたほうがいい」
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Irgendein verrückter Menschling hat sich kürzlich dort hingewagt. Wie haben sie ihn genannt? Wersorean? Er war alt, aber stark ... und zu laut. Sein Besuch hat all die Freaks vermutlich aufgebracht. Ihr solltet vorsichtiger und ruhiger sein, als er es war."
languages.original_text: "Some unhinged humanling went there recently. What did they call him? Wersorean? He was old, but strong... and too loud. His visit probably stirred up all the freaks. You should be more careful and quieter than he was."

traits.locale_text: "Irgendein verrückter Menschling hat sich kürzlich dort hingewagt. Wie haben sie ihn genannt? Wersorean? Er war alt, aber stark ... und zu laut. Sein Besuch hat all die Freaks vermutlich aufgebracht. Ihr solltet vorsichtiger und ruhiger sein, als er es war."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: « Un humain complètement dérangé y est descendu, il y a peu. Comment est-ce qu'il s'appelait, déjà ? Wersorean ? Il était vieux, mais fort... et beaucoup trop bruyant. Il a dû attirer l'attention de tous les monstres qui vivent là-bas. Je vous conseille d'être plus {mf|prudent|prudente} que lui et de faire moins de bruit. »
languages.original_text: "Some unhinged humanling went there recently. What did they call him? Wersorean? He was old, but strong... and too loud. His visit probably stirred up all the freaks. You should be more careful and quieter than he was."

traits.locale_text: « Un humain complètement dérangé y est descendu, il y a peu. Comment est-ce qu'il s'appelait, déjà ? Wersorean ? Il était vieux, mais fort... et beaucoup trop bruyant. Il a dû attirer l'attention de tous les monstres qui vivent là-bas. Je vous conseille d'être plus {mf|prudent|prudente} que lui et de faire moins de bruit. »
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Geçenlerde kaçık bir insancığın yolu oraya düşmüştü. Neydi adı, Wersorean mıydı? Yaşlı ama güçlüydü... Çenesi de susmak bilmiyordu. Muhtemelen ucubeleri de o ayaklandırdı. Sen daha dikkatli ve sessiz olmalısın."
languages.original_text: "Some unhinged humanling went there recently. What did they call him? Wersorean? He was old, but strong... and too loud. His visit probably stirred up all the freaks. You should be more careful and quieter than he was."

traits.locale_text: "Kaçık bir insancık geçenlerde gitmişti oraya. Neydi adı, Wersorean mıydı? Yaşlı ama güçlüydü... çenesi de susmuyordu. Muhtemelen ucubeleri de o ayaklandırdı. Sen daha dikkatli ve sessiz olmalısın."
traits.speaker: Anger
